org.miniauth.service

Interface EndorserService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CredentialService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OAuthEndorserService

    public interface EndorserService
extends CredentialService
    Request "signer" in the case of OAuth. (Using a generic/broader term "endorse" instead of "sign" for future generalization.)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean endorse(OutgoingRequest request)
      Returns true if the request has been successfully "endorsed".

      • Methods inherited from interface org.miniauth.service.CredentialService

        getCredentialMapper

    • Method Detail

      • endorse

        boolean endorse(OutgoingRequest request)
                throws MiniAuthException
        Returns true if the request has been successfully "endorsed".
        Parameters:
        request - Partial outgoing request wrapper object. "In-out" param.
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful.
        Throws:
        MiniAuthException
